headline: Post-Quantum Cryptography Market Surges to $2.84 billion by 2030 - Dominated by NXP Semiconductor (Netherlands), Patero (US), Thales (France)
summary: Delray Beach, FL, Oct. 30, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- According to MarketsandMarkets™, the global Post-Quantum Cryptography Market size is projected to grow from USD 0.42 billion in 2025 to USD 2.84 billion by 2030, at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 46.2% during the forecast period. headline: Palo Alto Networks (PANW): Citizens JMP Lifts Price Target to $250 Ahead of Earnings
summary: Palo Alto Networks, Inc. (NASDAQ:PANW) is a Must-Watch AI Stocks on Wall Street. On October 27, Citizens JMP analyst Trevor Walsh raised the firm’s price target on the stock to $250 from $212 and kept an Outperform rating on the shares. Walsh believes that PANW is a key name to watch ahead of earnings, particularly because of […]
